Class ShoppingCart

java.lang.Object
shoppingCart.ShoppingCart
public class ShoppingCart extends Object
Represents a shopping cart for a user, allowing items to be added, removed, and total prices calculated. Also supports clearing the cart.
Author:
24862664

  • Constructor Details

    • ShoppingCart

      public ShoppingCart(users.User user)
      Constructs a shopping cart for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      User - object. Unique for the user who owns the shopping cart. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user is null

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(shoppingCart.ShoppingCartItem item)
      Adds an item to the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the item is null.

    • removeItem

      public boolean removeItem(int itemId)
      Removes an item from the cart by its ID.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • getTotalPrice

      public double getTotalPrice()
      Calculates the total price of all items in the cart, applying a discount for business users (20% off).
      Returns:
      The total price of the cart after any applicable discounts.

    • getItems

      public List<shoppingCart.ShoppingCartItem> getItems()
      Returns a list of items currently in the cart.
      Returns:
      A list of shopping cart items.

    • clearCart

      public void clearCart()
      Clears all items from the shopping cart.

    • getUser

      public users.User getUser()
      Returns the user associated with the shopping cart.
      Returns:
      The user associated with this cart.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the shopping cart.
